author: desruisseaux
msg: * Splited in two methods: ensureValidType and ensureCompatibleType.
* For the ensureValidType part, replaced the loop over getInterfaces() by a call to Class.isAssignableFrom.
Removed the throws IllegalArgumentException in method signature, because this exception should never happen
if the user does not bypass parameterized types (in the later case, he would get compiler warnings anyway).

author: dkulp
msg: [CXF-4815] Only return the auth creds once

author: sseth
msg: YARN-355. Fixes a bug where RM app submission could jam under load. Contributed by Daryn Sharp.
